description:
This rechargeable light up necklace makes keeping your 4-legged friend seen easier than ever. Nite Ize has updated their NiteHowl necklace with simple USB charging. Sized to fit pooches of all sizes, simply slide it on and take back the dark, one walkies at a time.

  • Choose from red, green or blue light to keep track of multiple K9s
  • Disc-O mode fluidly cycles through all the colours of the rainbow and is hard to miss
  • Easily slides over dog's neck as a bright LED addition to an existing collar
  • Universal sizing: cut to fit from 30.5 – 68.5cm (12 – 27in.)
  • Glow and flash modes
  • 360° of illumination
  • Battery run time: 5 hours
  • Micro-USB charging in only 1.5 hours
  • Weather resistant
name: Nite Ize NiteHowl Rechargeable LED Safety Necklace
